headline: A Dave Ramsey Caller Is Losing His High-Paying Job In December, Yet He's In A Position Most People Dream Of. 'This Is Just An Inconvenience'
summary: On a recent episode of “The Ramsey Show,” a caller named Michael from Boston shared that he's about to lose his $160,000-a-year job in product management and a 20% annual bonus. His company is letting him go at the end of the year. Normally, this kind of news would send a household into panic mode, especially in today’s economy. A Wave Of Layoffs Is Hitting Corporate America Mass layoffs have been making headlines across the U.S. Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN), United Parcel Service (NYSE:UPS) and Intel (

headline: Fed's Goolsbee, Cook, Daly join growing chorus of officials undecided on December rate cut
summary: Three Fed officials said Monday they are undecided about whether to cut interest rates again in December.

headline: UPS expands healthcare reach with completion of Andlauer Healthcare deal
summary: UPS has completed the acquisition of Andlauer Healthcare Group in Canada. The post UPS expands healthcare reach with completion of Andlauer Healthcare deal appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: UPS expands healthcare reach with completion of Andlauer Healthcare deal
raw.summary: UPS has completed the acquisition of Andlauer Healthcare Group in Canada. The post UPS expands healthcare reach with completion of Andlauer Healthcare deal appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: UPS Completes Acquisition of Andlauer Healthcare Group Inc.
summary: Andlauer Healthcare Group Inc. ("AHG") (TSX: AND) today announced the completion, effective November 1, 2025, of the previously announced plan of arrangement under the Business Corporations Act (Ontario) (the "Arrangement") pursuant to which UPS acquired, directly or indirectly, all of the issued and outstanding multiple voting shares and subordinate voting shares of AHG for cash consideration equal to C$55.00 per share.

headline: UPS Acquires Andlauer Healthcare Group for $1.6 Billion, Accelerating Its Expansion as a Global Leader in Complex Healthcare Logistics
summary: ATLANTA, November 03, 2025--UPS (NYSE: UPS) today announced that it has completed the acquisition of Andlauer Healthcare Group Inc. (TSX: AND) ("AHG"), a leading North American supply chain management company headquartered in Canada and offering customized third-party logistics and specialized cold chain transportation solutions for the healthcare sector. headline: Why Corporate America Ended Its Firing Freeze
summary: The job market has softened in recent months, marking a safer environment for companies to start streamlining their workforces. A host of them have pounced, including Amazon, UPS, Target and Meta Platforms, which collectively announced tens of thousands of layoffs in recent weeks.

raw.headline: Why Corporate America Ended Its Firing Freeze
raw.summary: The job market has softened in recent months, marking a safer environment for companies to start streamlining their workforces. A host of them have pounced, including Amazon, UPS, Target and Meta Platforms, which collectively announced tens of thousands of layoffs in recent weeks.

headline: UPS readies 5.9% rate bump, fee increases on Dec. 22
summary: The changes, which will impact ground, air and international shipments, mirror the hikes rival FedEx announced earlier this year.
